attributes.action: LOOK INTO EQUAL LAWS FOR POLICE AND PUBLIC MOTORING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THE HOME OFFICE STATE THAT THE POLICE CAN ONLY BREAK HIGHWAY CODE REGULATIONS ON AN EMERGENCY, YET CERTAIN POLICE FORCES HAVE LET OFF MANY OFFICERS `SPEEDING`, THIS MAKES A TWO TIER SYSTEM WHICH IS WRONG AS LAWS SHOULD BE APPLIED ACROSS THE BOARD, HOW CAN THEY BREAK THE LAW THEM SELVES AND THEN FINE THE PUBLIC.

THIS PETITION IS TO MAKE THE LAWS EQUAL FOR BOTH THE POLICE AND YJE PUBLIC, PLEASE SIGN IF YOU AGREE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
